com.viaoa.jsp

Interface OAJspComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OAButton, OACheckBox, OACombo, OADialog, OAFileInput, OAGrid, OAHtmlElement, OAImage, OALink, OAList, OAListing, OAPassword, OARadio, OAServletImage, OATable, OATextArea, OATextField

    public interface OAJspComponent
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface used for implementing JSP controls.
    Author:
    vvia
